context.Nepali: एउटा कलेजका २०० विद्यार्थीहरूमा गरिएको सर्वेक्षणमा, ६०% विद्यार्थीले व्यवस्थापन (Management) र ४०% ले विज्ञान (Science) मन पराउँछन् । यदि २० जना विद्यार्थीले दुवै विषय मन पराउँछन् भने:
context.English: In a survey of 200 college students, 60% like Management and 40% like Science. If 20 students like both subjects:

sub_questions.questionNepali: व्यवस्थापन मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या कति छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the number of students who like Management?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
जम्मा विद्यार्थी संख्या २०० छ । व्यवस्थापन मन पराउने विद्यार्थी ६०% छन् । संख्या निकाल्न: $200 \text{ को } 60\% = 200 \times \frac{60}{100} = 120$ जना ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Total students are 200. Students liking Management are 60%. Calculation: $60\% \text{ of } 200 = \frac{60}{100} \times 200 = 120$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: विज्ञान मात्र मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the number of students who like Science only.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पहिले विज्ञान मन पराउने जम्मा संख्या निकालौँ: $200 \text{ को } 40\% = 80$ जना । विज्ञान मात्र मन पराउने संख्या निकाल्न, विज्ञानको जम्मा संख्याबाट दुवै विषय मन पराउने संख्या (२०) घटाउनुपर्छ । विज्ञान मात्र = $80 - 20 = 60$ जना ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First, find total Science students: $40\% \text{ of } 200 = 80$. To find Science only, subtract those who like both subjects (20) from the total Science students. Science Only = $80 - 20 = 60$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: कुनै पनि विषय मन नपराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या गणना गर्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the number of students who like neither subject.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पहिले कम्तीमा एउटा विषय मन पराउने ($M \cup S$) निकालौँ: $n(M) + n(S) - n(M \cap S) = 120 + 80 - 20 = 180$ । अब कुनै पनि मन नपराउने संख्या निकाल्न जम्मा संख्याबाट यो घटाउनुपर्छ: $200 - 180 = 20$ जना ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First, find the union ($M \cup S$): $n(M) + n(S) - n(M \cap S) = 120 + 80 - 20 = 180$. Then, subtract this from the total number of students to find those who like neither: $200 - 180 = 20$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: विज्ञान मात्र मन पराउने र व्यवस्थापन मात्र मन पराउनेको अनुपात निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the ratio of students liking Science only to Management only.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
विज्ञान मात्र मन पराउने संख्या ६० हो । व्यवस्थापन मात्र मन पराउने संख्या = जम्मा व्यवस्थापन - दुवै = $120 - 20 = 100$ हो । अनुपात = $60 : 100$ । २० ले भाग गर्दा $3 : 5$ हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Number liking Science only is 60. Number liking Management only is Total Management - Both = $120 - 20 = 100$. The ratio is $60 : 100$, which simplifies to $3 : 5$.
Citation: Lesson 1

context.Nepali: कुनै रकमको २ वर्षमा १०% वार्षिक ब्याजदरले चक्रीय मिश्रधन रु. ६,०५० हुन्छ ।
context.English: The annual compound amount of a sum in 2 years at 10% p.a. is Rs. 6,050.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the Principal.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the compound amount formula $CA = P(1 + \frac{R}{100})^T$: $6050 = P(1 + 0.1)^2$. This simplifies to $6050 = P(1.21)$. Solving for P, we get $P = 6050 / 1.21 = 5000$.
Citation: Lesson 2

sub_questions.questionNepali: उक्त मूलधनको सोही दरमा अर्ध-वार्षिक चक्रीय ब्याज कति हुन्छ ? (२ वर्षको लागि)
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the semi-annual compound interest on that principal at the same rate for 2 years?
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the semi-annual interest formula $CI = P[(1 + \frac{R}{200})^{2T} - 1]$: $5000[(1 + 0.05)^4 - 1]$. Since $1.05^4 \approx 1.215506$, the interest is $5000 \times 0.215506 \approx 1077.53$.
Citation: Lesson 2

context.Nepali: एउटा स्कुटरको मूल्य २ वर्ष अघि रु. १,५०,००० थियो । अहिले यसको मूल्य रु. १,२१,५०० छ ।
context.English: The price of a scooter 2 years ago was Rs. 1,50,000. Its present price is Rs. 1,21,500.

sub_questions.questionNepali: वार्षिक ह्रास दर (Rate of Depreciation) पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the annual rate of depreciation.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the depreciation formula $V_T = V_0(1 - \frac{R}{100})^T$: $121500 = 150000(1 - \frac{R}{100})^2$. Dividing gives $0.81 = (1 - \frac{R}{100})^2$. Taking the square root gives $0.9 = 1 - \frac{R}{100}$, so $R = 10\%$.
Citation: Lesson 3

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What will be the price after 1 year (from now)?
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Apply the 10% depreciation to the current price of Rs. 1,21,500. Price after 1 year = $121500(1 - 0.10) = 121500 \times 0.9 = 109350$.
Citation: Lesson 3

context.Nepali: एउटा पसलेले $500 अमेरिकी डलर साट्दा रु. 66,000 प्राप्त गर्यो । (विनिमय दर: $1 = रु. 132)
context.English: A shopkeeper exchanged $500 US Dollars and got Rs. 66,000. (Exchange rate: $1 = Rs. 132)

sub_questions.questionNepali: भोलिपल्ट नेपाली मुद्रा ५% ले अवमूल्यन भयो भने, अब $500 साट्दा कति रुपैयाँ बढी आउँछ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: If Nepali currency is devalued by 5% the next day, how much extra rupees will be received for $500?
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Devaluation increases the exchange rate. New rate = $132 \times 1.05 = 138.6$. New amount received = $500 \times 138.6 = 69,300$. Extra amount = $69300 - 66000 = 3,300$.
Citation: Lesson 4

sub_questions.questionNepali: रु. १,५०,००० साट्न कति डलर चाहिन्छ (नयाँ दरमा)?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: How many dollars are needed to exchange for Rs. 1,50,000 (at new rate)?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
नयाँ दर रु. १३८.६० प्रयोग गर्दा, आवश्यक डलर = $\frac{1,50,000}{138.6} \approx 1082.25$ डलर ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the new rate of 138.6, Dollars needed = $1,50,000 / 138.6 \approx 1082.25$.
Citation: Lesson 4

context.Nepali: एउटा त्रिभुजाकार प्रिज्मको लम्बाइ २० से.मि. छ । यसको आधार ३ से.मि., ४ से.मि. र ५ से.मि. भुजाहरू भएको समकोण त्रिभुज हो ।
context.English: The length of a triangular prism is 20 cm. Its base is a right-angled triangle with sides 3 cm, 4 cm, and 5 cm.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the area of the base (triangle).
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
यो समकोण त्रिभुज हो (भुजाहरू ३, ४, ५)। क्षेत्रफल = $\frac{1}{2} \times \text{base} \times \text{height} = \frac{1}{2} \times 3 \times 4 = 6$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
This is a right-angled triangle (3-4-5 sides). Area = $\frac{1}{2} \times 3 \times 4 = 6$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the volume of the prism.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
प्रिज्मको आयतन = आधारको क्षेत्रफल $\times$ लम्बाइ = $6 \times 20 = 120$ घन से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Volume of prism = Base Area $\times$ Length = $6 \times 20 = 120$ cubic cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.Nepali: एउटा बेलना र सोलीको आधारको अर्धव्यास बराबर (७ से.मि.) छ । यदि दुवैको उचाइ २४ से.मि. छ भने:
context.English: A cylinder and a cone have equal base radius (7 cm). If both have height 24 cm:

sub_questions.questionNepali: बेलना र सोलीको आयतनको अनुपात कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the ratio of the volume of the cylinder to the cone?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
बेलनाको आयतन $\pi r^2 h$ र सोलीको आयतन $\frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$ हुन्छ । एउटै आधार र उचाइ हुँदा अनुपात $1 : \frac{1}{3}$ वा $3 : 1$ हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Cylinder volume is $\pi r^2 h$ and Cone volume is $\frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$. With same r and h, the ratio is $1 : 1/3$ or $3 : 1$.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: दुवैको वक्र सतहको क्षेत्रफलको अन्तर निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the difference between their curved surface areas.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
सोलीको छड्के उचाइ $l = \sqrt{24^2 + 7^2} = 25$ । सोलीको CSA = $\pi rl = \frac{22}{7} \times 7 \times 25 = 550$ । बेलनाको CSA = $2\pi rh = 2 \times \frac{22}{7} \times 7 \times 24 = 1056$ । अन्तर = $1056 - 550 = 506$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Cone slant height $l = \sqrt{24^2 + 7^2} = 25$. Cone CSA = $\pi rl = 550$. Cylinder CSA = $2\pi rh = 1056$. Difference = $1056 - 550 = 506$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.Nepali: एउटा वर्गाकार कोठाको भुइँको क्षेत्रफल १४४ वर्ग फिट छ । यदि कोठाको उचाइ १० फिट छ भने:
context.English: The floor area of a square room is 144 sq. ft. If the height of the room is 10 ft:

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the length of the room?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कोठा वर्गाकार भएकाले, लम्बाइ = $\sqrt{\text{क्षेत्रफल}} = \sqrt{144} = 12$ फिट ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since the room is square, Length = $\sqrt{\text{Area}} = \sqrt{144} = 12$ ft.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: चार भित्तामा प्लास्टर गर्न प्रति वर्ग फिट रु. २० का दरले कति खर्च लाग्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the cost of plastering 4 walls at Rs. 20 per sq. ft?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
चार भित्ताको क्षेत्रफल = $4 \times l \times h = 4 \times 12 \times 10 = 480$ वर्ग फिट । खर्च = $480 \times 20 = 9600$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Area of 4 walls = $4 \times l \times h$ (for square room) $= 4 \times 12 \times 10 = 480$ sq. ft. Cost = $480 \times 20 = 9600$.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.Nepali: एउटा अंकगणितीय श्रेणीको पाचौं पद १९ र आठौं पद ३१ छ ।
context.English: The 5th term of an arithmetic series is 19 and the 8th term is 31.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the common difference ($d$)?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
सूत्र $t_n = a + (n-1)d$ प्रयोग गरौँ । $a + 4d = 19$ र $a + 7d = 31$ । घटाउँदा: $3d = 12$, त्यसैले $d = 4$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ६
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Use $t_n = a + (n-1)d$. We have $a + 4d = 19$ and $a + 7d = 31$. Subtracting the equations gives $3d = 12$, so $d = 4$.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the value of x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
मानौँ $y = \frac{x}{x-2}$ । समीकरण $y + \frac{1}{y} = \frac{5}{2}$ बन्छ । हल गर्दा $2y^2 - 5y + 2 = 0$ । $y = 2$ वा $y = 1/2$ ।
यदि $y = 2$, $\frac{x}{x-2} = 2 \Rightarrow x = 2x - 4 \Rightarrow x = 4$ ।
यदि $y = 1/2$, $\frac{x}{x-2} = \frac{1}{2} \Rightarrow 2x = x - 2 \Rightarrow x = -2$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ७
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Let $y = \frac{x}{x-2}$. The equation becomes $y + 1/y = 5/2$, leading to $2y^2 - 5y + 2 = 0$. Roots are $y = 2, 1/2$. Solving for x: If $y=2$, $x=4$. If $y=1/2$, $x=-2$.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the value of x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
मानौँ $3^x = a$ । समीकरण $a^2 - 4a + 3 = 0$ बन्छ । खण्डीकरण गर्दा $(a-3)(a-1) = 0$ ।
$a=3$ हुँदा $3^x = 3^1 \Rightarrow x = 1$ ।
$a=1$ हुँदा $3^x = 3^0 \Rightarrow x = 0$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Let $3^x = a$. The equation is $a^2 - 4a + 3 = 0$. Factors are $(a-3)(a-1) = 0$. If $a=3$, $x=1$. If $a=1$, $x=0$.
Citation: Lesson 9

context.Nepali: एउटा त्रिभुज र आयत एउटै आधार र उही समानान्तर रेखाहरू बिच बनेका छन् । यदि आयतको लम्बाइ १० से.मि. र चौडाइ ६ से.मि. छ भने:
context.English: A triangle and a rectangle stand on the same base and between the same parallel lines. If the rectangle's length is 10 cm and breadth is 6 cm:

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the area of the rectangle?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
आयतको क्षेत्रफल = लम्बाइ $\times$ चौडाइ = $10 \times 6 = 60$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Rectangle Area = $10 \times 6 = 60$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the area of the triangle.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
एउटै आधार र समानान्तर रेखा बिच बनेको त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल आयत (वा समानान्तर चतुर्भुज) को आधा हुन्छ । क्षेत्रफल = $60 / 2 = 30$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The area of the triangle is half the area of the rectangle on the same base. Area = $60/2 = 30$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.Nepali: चक्रीय चतुर्भुज PQRS मा, $\angle P = 3x$ र $\angle R = 2x$ छन् ।
context.English: In cyclic quadrilateral PQRS, $\angle P = 3x$ and $\angle R = 2x$.

sub_questions.questionNepali: चक्रीय चतुर्भुजका सम्मुख कोणहरूको सम्बन्ध लेख्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the relation of opposite angles of a cyclic quadrilateral.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
चक्रीय चतुर्भुजका सम्मुख कोणहरू सम्पूरक हुन्छन् (जोड $180^\circ$) ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Opposite angles of a cyclic quadrilateral are supplementary (sum to $180^\circ$).
Citation: Lesson 12

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the value of x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$3x + 2x = 180 \Rightarrow 5x = 180 \Rightarrow x = 36$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$3x + 2x = 180 \Rightarrow 5x = 180 \Rightarrow x = 36$.
Citation: Lesson 12

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the value of $\angle P$?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$\angle P = 3x = 3 \times 36 = 108^\circ$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$\angle P = 3(36) = 108^\circ$.
Citation: Lesson 12

context.Nepali: एउटा समबाहु त्रिभुजको परिमिति ३० से.मि. छ ।
context.English: The perimeter of an equilateral triangle is 30 cm.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the length of the side of the triangle?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
परिमिति $3a = 30$, त्यसैले भुजा $a = 10$ से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Perimeter $3a = 30$, so side $a = 10$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the area of the triangle.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
क्षेत्रफल = $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^2 = \frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} (100) = 25\sqrt{3}$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Area = $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} (10)^2 = 25\sqrt{3}$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.Nepali: एउटा मानिसले टावरको टुप्पोमा हेर्दा उन्नतांश कोण $४५^\circ$ पाउँछ । यदि मानिस टावरबाट ५० मिटर टाढा छ भने:
context.English: A man observes the top of a tower at an angle of elevation of $45^\circ$. He is 50 m away from the tower.

sub_questions.questionNepali: टावरको उचाइ कति छ ? (मानिसको उचाइ बेवास्ता गर्नुहोस्)
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the height of the tower? (Ignore man's height)
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$\tan(45^\circ) = \frac{\text{Height}}{\text{Base}}$ । $1 = \frac{h}{50}$ । त्यसैले $h = 50$ मिटर ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$\tan(45^\circ) = h/50$. Since $\tan(45) = 1$, $h = 50$ m.
Citation: Lesson 15

context.Nepali: दिइएको तथ्याङ्कबाट मध्यक (Mean) ३० छ । तथ्याङ्क: २०, x, ४०, ३०, २०, ४०
context.English: The mean of the given data is 30. Data: 20, x, 40, 30, 20, 40

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the value of x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
जम्मा संख्या ($N$) = ६ । योगफल = $20+x+40+30+20+40 = 150+x$ । मध्यक $\frac{150+x}{6} = 30 \Rightarrow 150+x = 180 \Rightarrow x = 30$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Sum = $150+x$. $N=6$. Mean equation: $(150+x)/6 = 30 \Rightarrow 150+x=180 \Rightarrow x=30$.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the first quartile ($Q_1$).
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Sorted Data: 20, 20, 30, 30, 40, 40. $Q_1$ position is 1.75th. Value is $20 + 0.75(0) = 20$.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the median.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
मध्यिका तेस्रो र चौथो पदको औसत हो: $\frac{30+30}{2} = 30$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Median is average of 3rd and 4th terms: $(30+30)/2 = 30$.
Citation: Lesson 13

context.Nepali: राम्रोसँग फिटिएको ५२ पत्ती तासबाट एउटा तास थुतिएको छ ।
context.English: A card is drawn from a well-shuffled deck of 52 cards.

sub_questions.questionNepali: तास 'रातो' (Red) वा 'कालो' (Black) हुने सम्भाव्यताहरूको नमुना क्षेत्र वर्णन गर्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Describe the sample space outcomes for the card being Red or Black.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
तासको गड्डीमा २६ वटा रातो र २६ वटा कालो तास हुन्छन्। नमुना क्षेत्रमा यी दुई समूह पर्छन्।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The deck has 26 Red cards and 26 Black cards. The outcomes are simply Red or Black.
Citation: Lesson 14

sub_questions.questionNepali: तास एक्का (Ace) वा बादशाह (King) पर्ने सम्भाव्यता निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the probability of getting an Ace or a King.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
४ वटा एक्का र ४ वटा बादशाह हुन्छन्। यी परस्पर निशेधक (Mutually Exclusive) हुन्। सम्भाव्यता = $\frac{4}{52} + \frac{4}{52} = \frac{8}{52} = \frac{2}{13}$।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
There are 4 Aces and 4 Kings. Probability = $P(A) + P(K) = 4/52 + 4/52 = 8/52 = 2/13$.
Citation: Lesson 14
